languages.text:
The wearer suffers −35% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.
The first use of a grenade in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} does not count toward the limit of {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
The wearer suffers −35% less damage from area attacks.
The first use of a grenade in a turn does not count toward the limit of attacks per turn.

languages.text:
